verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son אִם־ <WH518> if תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> if thou wilt receive אֲמָרָ֑י <WH561> my words וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <WH4687> my commandments תִּצְפֹּ֥ן <WH6845> and hide אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> within

לְהַקְשִׁ֣יב <WH7181> So that thou incline לַֽחָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> unto wisdom אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <WH241> thine ear תַּטֶּ֥ה <WH5186> [and] apply לִ֝בְּךָ֗ <WH3820> thine heart לַתְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> to understanding

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אִ֣ם <WH518> if לַבִּינָ֣ה <WH998> after knowledge תִקְרָ֑א <WH7121> Yea if thou criest לַ֝תְּבוּנָ֗ה <WH8394> for understanding תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> [and] liftest up קוֹלֶֽךָ׃ <WH6963> thy voice
אִם־ <WH518> If תְּבַקְשֶׁ֥נָּה <WH1245> If thou seekest כַכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> her as silver וְֽכַמַּטְמוֹנִ֥ים <WH4301> for her as [for] hid treasures תַּחְפְּשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <WH2664> and searchest

אָ֗ז <WH227> Then תָּ֭בִין <WH995> Then shalt thou understand יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> the fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> the knowledge אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> of God תִּמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> and find

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> For the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> giveth חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom מִ֝פִּ֗יו <WH6310> out of his mouth דַּ֣עַת <WH1847> [cometh] knowledge וּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> and understanding

[וְצָפַן כ] (יִצְפֹּ֣ן <WH6845> reserve ק) לַ֭יְשָׁרִים <WH3477> for the righteous תּוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <WH8454> sound wisdom מָ֝גֵ֗ן <WH4043> [he is] a buckler לְהֹ֣לְכֵי <WH1980> to them that walk תֹֽם׃ <WH8537> uprightly
לִ֭נְצֹר <WH5341> He keepeth אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> the paths מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> of judgment וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way [חֲסִידֹו כ] (חֲסִידָ֣יו <WH2623> godly ק) יִשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> and preserveth

אָ֗ז <WH227> Then תָּ֭בִין <WH995> Then shalt thou understand צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> righteousness וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment וּ֝מֵישָׁרִ֗ים <WH4339> and equity כָּל־ <WH3605> every מַעְגַּל־ <WH4570> path טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [yea] every good

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תָב֣וֹא <WH935> entereth חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> When wisdom בְלִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> into thine heart וְ֝דַ֗עַת <WH1847> and knowledge לְֽנַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> unto thy soul יִנְעָֽם׃ <WH5276> is pleasant
מְ֭זִמָּה <WH4209> Discretion תִּשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> shall preserve עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> and תְּבוּנָ֥ה <WH8394> thee understanding תִנְצְרֶֽכָּה׃ <WH5341> shall keep

לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ <WH5337> To deliver מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> thee from the way רָ֑ע <WH7451> of the evil מֵ֝אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> [man] from the man מְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that speaketh תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <WH8419> froward things
הַ֭עֹ֣זְבִים <WH5800> Who leave אָרְח֣וֹת <WH734> the paths יֹ֑שֶׁר <WH3476> of uprightness לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> to walk בְּדַרְכֵי־ <WH1870> in the ways חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> of darkness
הַ֭שְּׂמֵחִים <WH8056> Who rejoice לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <WH1523> [and] delight בְּֽתַהְפֻּכ֥וֹת <WH8419> in the frowardness רָֽע׃ <WH7451> of the wicked
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Whose אָרְחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <WH734> Whose ways עִקְּשִׁ֑ים <WH6141> [are] crooked וּ֝נְלוֹזִ֗ים <WH3868> and [they] froward בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4570> in their paths

לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ <WH5337> To deliver מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman זָרָ֑ה <WH2114> thee from the strange מִ֝נָּכְרִיָּ֗ה <WH5237> [even] from the stranger אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <WH561> with her words הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃ <WH2505> [which] flattereth

הַ֭עֹזֶבֶת <WH5800> Which forsaketh אַלּ֣וּף <WH441> the guide נְעוּרֶ֑יהָ <WH5271> of her youth וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> the covenant אֱלֹהֶ֣יהָ <WH430> of her God שָׁכֵֽחָה׃ <WH7911> and forgetteth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁ֣חָה <WH7743> inclineth אֶל־ <WH413> to מָ֣וֶת <WH4194> unto death בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> For her house וְאֶל־ <WH413> to רְ֝פָאִ֗ים <WH7496> unto the dead מַעְגְּלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH4570> and her paths

כָּל־ <WH3605> who בָּ֭אֶיהָ <WH935> None that go לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְשׁוּב֑וּן <WH7725> unto her return again וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַ֝שִּׂ֗יגוּ <WH5381> neither take they hold אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> of the paths חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of life

לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> So תֵּ֭לֵךְ <WH1980> will walk בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> of good וְאָרְח֖וֹת <WH734> the paths צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> [men] and keep
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH3477> For the upright יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall dwell אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <WH8549> and the perfect יִוָּ֥תְרוּ <WH3498> shall remain בָֽהּ׃

וּ֭רְשָׁעִים <WH7563> But the wicked מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the earth יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ <WH3772> shall be cut off וּ֝בוֹגְדִ֗ים <WH898> and the transgressors יִסְּח֥וּ <WH5255> shall be rooted out מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at פ
